cause.description:
1 out of 5 people suffer from a mental illness. There are so many people out there who suffer without any help or support. So many people feel as though they are forced to hide their illness and not embrace it in a positive light. From Depression, Anorexia, ADHD, Bipolar Disorder, to Schizophrenia and Cyclothymia, these illnesses need to be addressed and given attention in today's society.
1. Fight the stigmas associated with mental illness.
2. Mental illness is everyone's concern.
3. Embrace your illness in a positive light.
4. Support those with mental illnesses.
cause.mission: Create awareness for mental health and issues surrounding this cause.
cause.name: Teens for Mental Health
